Name: MAGICAL DEATHPAIR
About the game: Can you swear you won't betray me? MAGICAL DEATHPAIR is an adventure game that sixteen witches are find themselves in a game of life and death. Warning: This game contains scenes of explicit gore and sexual content. STORY It is November 2020 in a world where witches secretly protect Tokyo's peace. A sudden monster appearance causes a huge rise in missing persons. Sixteen of the best witches are sent out to deal with the problem and find themselves in a game of life and death. Note: You can play the first chapter in this Steam version. MAGICAL DEATHPAIR Art Book You can enjoy the game creator yatsunagi's artwork and commentary on MAGICAL DEATHPAIR. (PDF data / Included in the game folder) MAGICAL DEATHPAIR Art Book (PDF / 40 pages) About the second chapter The second chapter of the game are currently being created by the game creator, yatsunagi san, but as the game is being created by alone As for the release of the second chapter, we will announce it on Steam News when we can.
